about_the_game:
STORY

A mysterious deadly plague has infected the city of Sun Stone, and all communications with the city administration have been cut off.

You are the appointed commander who must assemble a strike team and deploy them within the epicenter to find answers before the plague spreads beyond the city limits.

GAMEPLAY

If you ever wanted to feel like a military commander, now is your chance.

You will get to make strategic decisions that will impact the status, supplies, and sanity of your squad, and tactical decisions that will impact the survival chances of your strike team during combat engagement with the creatures.

- Management of resources

- Event system that gives you the choice for future outcomes

- Squad based real-time tactics combat( with an optional active pause mode) / Real Time Strategy

- Level up skills mechanics for your strike team units

- Equipment customization for your Strike team units

REPLAYABILITY

The game is rather short but emphasizes the replayability factor making each playthrough as unique and fresh as possible by giving you different new game bonus options, a bit of randomly generated content, achievements with rewards on the next game, multiple strategic choices with different outcomes, multiple paths, multiple endings and multiple ways to play.
